topic.title: How to Use Control Flow commands in a Test Case in

body.p: Katalon Recorder allows you to control test execution flow with control flow commands. To learn more about available control flow commands, you can refer to this document: Handle conditional cases in your tests.
This tutorial shows you how to use control flow commands in a test case.

ul.li: To use the sample project of this tutorial, navigate to Actions > Sample Projects, then add the Implement control flow in a test case project.
